content.title: Legion Remix Rewards - Mounts, Pets, Transmog - Wowhead
content.metaDescription: This guide details all of the rewards available from World of Warcraft Legion Remix. Discover new and returning cosmetic items and learn how to spend your Bronze on Mounts, Pets, Transmog, and more.

# Legion Remix Rewards - Mounts, Pets, Transmog
   [By Neryssa](/author/Neryssa)  Updated:  2025/10/07        NeryssaOffline on TwitchFollow  WoW Remix: Legion is a new event that allows you to relive the fan-favorite *Legion *expansion in a new way. Many rewards from Legion can be purchased with the [Bronze](https://www.wowhead.com/currency=2778/bronze) currency obtained through the Legion Remix. In this guide, we're covering all the rewards you can obtain from WoW Remix: Legion.

Check out our other Remix guides for more information about Legion Remix:

[Legion Remix Overview](https://www.wowhead.com/guide/wow-remix-legion-overview) [Legion Remix: Infinite Artifact Weapons](https://www.wowhead.com/guide/legion-remix-infinite-artifact-weapons-abilities-traits)
## WoW Remix: Legion Timerunning Rewards in Retail WoW
All rewards in this guide that can be purchased during WoW Remix: Legion will be accessed by Retail WoW characters after you obtain them! Note that if an item says **WoW Remix** in the tooltip, it is something which can only be obtained through the Timerunning event, not other sources.
## WoW Remix: Legion Achievements
Several Achievements grant cosmetic rewards in WoW Remix: Legion. Below, we highlight the meta achievements that grant cosmetic rewards, which are transferred to Retail when obtained.
### Titles in Remix: Legion
You can obtain the following titles in Remix: Legion:

- [Timerunner %s](https://www.wowhead.com/title/timerunner-825) - From the achievement [Timerunner](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42301/timerunner): Reach Level 80 with a Timerunner in Legion Remix.

- [Chronoscholar %s](https://www.wowhead.com/title/chronoscholar-926) - From the achievement [Tenured in the Timeways IV](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=60935/tenured-in-the-timeways-iv): Complete enough Infinite Research to earn a promotion to Principal Chronoquery Investigator.

- [%s of the Infinite Chaos](https://www.wowhead.com/title/of-the-infinite-chaos-971) - From the achievement [Heroic Legion Remix Raids](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=61079/heroic-legion-remix-raids): Complete all Legion Raids on Heroic Difficulty during Legion Remix.

- [%s the Infernal](https://www.wowhead.com/title/the-infernal-970) - From the achievement [Timeworn Keystone Enthusiast](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42691/timeworn-keystone-enthusiast): Complete any Timeworn Keystone Dungeon with a key level of 40 or higher with a Timerunner.


### Sargerei Commander Transmogs
Four tints of the Sargerei Commander transmogs are available for completing several achievements in Legion Remix. These are themed Sargerei transmogs, which includes incredible-looking cloaks with permanent particle effects!

- [Ensemble: Sargerei Commander's Felscorned Regalia](https://www.wowhead.com/item=253343/ensemble-sargerei-commanders-felscorned-regalia) - From the achievement [To Fel and Back](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=61337/to-fel-and-back): Complete the Legion Remix campaign by completing the quest [Shape a New Legend](https://www.wowhead.com/quest=91722/shape-a-new-legend).

- [Ensemble: Sargerei Commander's Voidscarred Regalia](https://www.wowhead.com/item=257104/ensemble-sargerei-commanders-voidscarred-regalia) - From the achievement [Heroic Broken Isles World Quests IV](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=61070/heroic-broken-isles-world-quests-iv): Complete 100 World Quests in Heroic World Tier as a Legion Timerunner.

- [Ensemble: Sargerei Commander's Lightbound Regalia](https://www.wowhead.com/item=257106/ensemble-sargerei-commanders-lightbound-regalia) - From the achievement [Mythic Legion Remix Raids](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=61078/mythic-legion-remix-raids): Complete all Legion Raids on Mythic difficulty during Legion Remix.

- [Ensemble: Sargerei Commander's Hellforged Regalia](https://www.wowhead.com/item=257105/ensemble-sargerei-commanders-hellforged-regalia) - From the achievement: [Timeworn Keystone Hero](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42690/timeworn-keystone-hero): Complete any Timeworn Keystone Dungeon with a key level of 30 or greater with a Timerunner.


 


### Zone and Raid Completion Rewards
Earning zone completion and one raid completion achievement will grant you cosmetic rewards![Azsuna](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42319/azsuna) - [Warden's Companion](https://www.wowhead.com/item=252301/wardens-companion)Earn this baby Warden owl pet by completing at least 2 out of the 4 Azsuna achievements:

- [Campaign: Azsuna](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42317/campaign-azsuna) - Complete the main Azsuna storyline;

- [Tour Azsuna](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42515/tour-azsuna) - Explore Azsuna, defeat rare enemies and fully explore the Azsuna map;

- [Looking for Group: Azsuna](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42519/looking-for-group-azsuna) - Complete the Eye of Azshara and Vault of the Wardens dungeons;

- [Court of Farondis](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42318/court-of-farondis) - Earn Exalted with the [Court of Farondis](https://www.wowhead.com/faction=1900/court-of-farondis).

[Val'Sharah](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42630/valsharah) - [Illusion: Felshatter](https://www.wowhead.com/item=253353/illusion-felshatter)Earn this weapon illusion featuring a green glow and your very own Fel Portal by completing at least 2 out of the 4 Val'sharah achievements:

- [Campaign: Val'Sharah](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42617/campaign-valsharah) - Complete the main Val'sharah storyline;

- [Tour Val'Sharah](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42594/tour-valsharah) - Explore Val'sharah, defeat rare enemies and fully explore the Val'sharah map;

- [Looking for Group: Val'Sharah](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42663/looking-for-group-valsharah) - Complete the Darkheart Thicket and Black Rook Hold dungeons, and the Emerald Nightmare raid;

- [Dreamweavers](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42619/dreamweavers) - Earn Exalted with the [Dreamweavers](https://www.wowhead.com/faction=1883/dreamweavers).

[Highmountain](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42541/highmountain) - [Duskytooth Fel Snooter](https://www.wowhead.com/item=246339/duskytooth-fel-snooter)Earn this fel baby capybara pet by completing at least 2 out of the 4 Highmountain achievements:

- [Campaign: Highmountain](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42552/campaign-highmountain) - Complete the main Highmountain storyline;

- [Tour Highmountain](https://www.wowhead.com/achievement=42642/tour-highmountain) - Explore Highmountain, defeat rare e...
